about_the_game:
Remain is a game with multiple survival elements. You will have to fight against zombies and mutated creatures. Also, you should always stay vigilant about other survivors, as they may raid your supplies or even take your life. Yet the light of hope is not extinguished, as if the dawn is waiting in the end even for the longest night! In this doomsday, some warriors are regaining hope by utilizing technological devices to tame "zombies" for rebuilding or protection.

 

The game currently has an 80 square kilometer explorable area, which is merely a portion of the ultimate design. The total area of the map is planned to cover 256 square kilometers, and it shall be completed in subsequent updates.

 

Remain has independent game servers that are maintained by our game studio. Players can create their own lobbies on the server. The PVE mode supports 4 - 16 people, and the PVP mode supports 30 - 100 people. Server sessions are spread across Europe, America, and Asia, allowing players to experience the game in a low-lag environment.

 

PVE Survival and Combat

Players can search for supplies, collect blueprints of various high-tech devices, face harsh survival environments or potentially hostile creatures, and improve their combat capabilities by surviving and exploring the open world.

In each cycle, a large number of AI will gather. It will be very difficult to completely defeat them. They are aiming to destroy your buildings and attack you. Some AI has special features:

Thieves: Steal your vegetables, crops, and your poultry.

Medical Teams: Some AI will help injured AIs to recover. You should first consider targeting this type of foes.

Summoning Teams: They may summon a larger number of AI in a short time, making your defense more challenging...

 

PVP Raiding and Combat

In the PVP mode, players can form teams to build their community bases, and there will be confrontation, raiding, slaughter, and betrayal between teams.

 

Capturing Zombies

You can learn various survival skills in the game, such as building skills, craft skills, advanced technology, or even building controller devices to capture zombies. The tamed zombies will help you fight against enemies or work for you.

 

Building Bases

You can build your survival fortress based on your ideas to resist zombies and other survivors. Or you can design it purely for art to show your building talent.

 

Agriculture

You can farm within the scope of your territory. You can build an irrigation system which will greatly save your time and promote the growth speed of crops. You can command the tamed zombies to operate in agriculture.

 

Power System

The game provides a highly free power system. You can use electricity supply devices to power up large-scale electric facilities. The supply devices Include generators, solar panels, and wind turbines. These will all be sources of your power.

 

Hunting

You can hunt in the game. The trophies of your prey can be traded and sold in farms or other places for trade, which enables you to gather your food supplies quickly. Some survival supplies can be directly purchased in the store.

 

Vehicles

You can obtain vehicles through scavenging and trading, but it is very difficult for you to own a complete vehicle. Usually, they will lack some parts and you have to repair and reassemble them to have a functional vehicle.

 

Trading

In the game, you can trade in the trading area, using items obtained through scavenging and combat to trade for your survival necessities.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10+ (64 bit)
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-2400/AMD FX-8320
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GTX 1060 6GB
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 40 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10+ (64 bit)
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-12600/AMD R7-3700X
  • Memory: 32 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA RTX 3060
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 40 GB available space

short_description: Remain is an MMO game. Within this open world, you can tame "zombies", making them your labor force, or commanding them to fight your foes. Apart from zombies, you will still have to face the survival challenges of food and water. Remaining warriors, don't let your guard down, and keep surviving...
